'''TU0''' is a version of ''[[Xbox 360 Edition]]'' released on May 9, 2012.<ref>{{cite | url = https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-us/product/minecraft-xbox-360-edition/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802584111f7 | title = Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition | website = Xbox 360 Marketplace | date = March 26, 2024}}</ref><ref>{{cite | url = http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-editions/minecraft-xbox-360-edition/mcx360-discussion/2064202-mcxbla-title-update-change-logs | title = Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition Patch change logs | website = Minecraft Forum | date = May 9, 2012}}</ref> This version is based on [[Java Edition Beta 1.6.6]]. The internal build date of this version is March 30, 2012, over a month before its release. This was the first version of the ''Xbox 360 Edition''; [[Xbox 360 Edition TU1|TU1]] was the day-one patch for consoles.

== Changes ==
* Menu scroll sound was changed to a higher pitch.
* Text is much blurrier.
* Added textures from [[Java Edition 1.2.1]] in <samp>res/1_2_2</samp>, although they remain unused in this version. The textures are used in later versions, first in TU3 and last in TU12.
* Minor tooltip changes.
* Pause menu is now lower.
